item.description:
We're starting our own Meetup Open Mic Night!  All members and guests are welcome to attend.  Help get this new event off the ground and make it a huge success!  Attend and bring your friends.

If you would like to perform, sign up when you arrive.  Acts will perform in the order they arrive and sign in.  Anything goes, rated G. Do you sing, play an instrument, recite poetry, tell jokes or read minds?

Sign-ups are open at 5:45 pm

Acts are from 6:00 pm to 8:30 pm

I'll be there at 5 pm so come early to socialize and get a java and/or a bite to eat. The cafe has lots of great food from lattes, to sandwiches, to salads, to pastries, etc.  Get something to eat and/or drink from the Cafe and bring it into the event room. 

Please note that no food or beverage is allowed in from the outside.

Get there when you can - we'll save you a seat!
item.how_to_find_us: Event room towards the back of the store.
item.why: Jacki, your organizer, is running it! Come and perform or come and watch. Audience members needed so bring your friends!
item.name: Open Mic Night at Tatnuck in Westboro
